categories.label: My friend and I are having a fight
categories.example: We're arguing and it's making me sad

categories.label: I feel anxious at school
categories.example: I worry about making mistakes in class

categories.label: I had an embarrassing moment
categories.example: I did something embarrassing in front of everyone

categories.label: I'm feeling left out
categories.example: My classmates didn't include me today

categories.label: I have a presentation coming up
categories.example: I'm nervous about presenting in class

categories.label: Someone was unkind to me
categories.example: A classmate was mean to me today

categories.label: I'm unhappy about a grade I received
categories.example: I got a grade I didn't like

categories.label: My sibling and I are having a fight
categories.example: We're arguing and can't get along

categories.label: My parents and I are in a disagreement
categories.example: We don't see eye to eye on something

categories.label: My family doesn't understand me
categories.example: I feel like they don't get me

distortions.name: Catastrophizing
distortions.example: This is going to ruin everything!
distortions.reframe: It might feel big now, but I can handle it.

distortions.name: Black-and-white thinking
distortions.example: If I'm not perfect, I'm a failure.
distortions.reframe: I can make mistakes and still be awesome.

distortions.name: Mind reading
distortions.example: They didn't talk to me, so they must hate me.
distortions.reframe: Maybe they're just having a hard day too.

distortions.name: Fortune telling
distortions.example: I'll never be good at this.
distortions.reframe: I'm learning, and practice helps me improve.

distortions.name: Should statements
distortions.reframe: It's okay to have different feelings.

distortions.name: Labeling
distortions.example: I'm stupid because I got a bad grade.
distortions.reframe: I got a bad grade, but I'm still smart and capable.

strategies.name: 5-4-3-2-1 Grounding
strategies.description: Name 5 things you see, 4 you can touch, 3 you hear, 2 you smell, 1 you taste
steps: Look around and name 5 things you can see
Listen and name 3 things you can hear

strategies.name: Butterfly Hugs
strategies.description: Cross your arms and tap your shoulders like butterfly wings
steps: Cross your arms over your chest
Tap your left shoulder with your right hand
Tap your right shoulder with your left hand

strategies.name: Box Breathing
strategies.description: Breathe in a square pattern: inhale, hold, exhale, hold

sampleProblems: My sibling didn't share with me
I'm worried about the test tomorrow
My friend didn't invite me to their party
I got in trouble at school
Someone called me a mean name
